intro.title: Welcome to DÖRING Consulting
intro.description: With over 15 years of experience in leadership positions in procurement and supply chain management, I offer customized consulting solutions for companies of all sizes. My expertise includes strategic transformation of procurement departments, optimization of supply chain processes, implementation of operational excellence, and interim management in key positions.

about.title: Alexander Döring
about.subtitle: Consultant for Procurement, Supply Chain Management & Operations

intro.part1: With over 15 years of experience in leadership positions in procurement and supply chain management, I offer customized consulting solutions for companies of all sizes. My expertise includes strategic transformation of procurement departments, optimization of supply chain processes, implementation of operational excellence, and interim management in key positions.
intro.part2: My goal is to help companies enhance their competitiveness, optimize costs, and achieve sustainable value creation. Through my practice-oriented approach and deep industry knowledge, I develop individual solutions that deliver measurable results.

cta.title: Let's Work Together
cta.description: Are you ready to optimize your procurement and supply chain processes and achieve measurable results? Contact me for a non-binding discussion about your specific requirements and objectives.

expertise.title: My Areas of Expertise
expertise.intro: As an experienced consultant, I offer specialized services in the following areas:

procurement.title: Procurement & Purchasing
procurement.description: Strategic realignment of procurement, development of category strategies, implementation of procurement controlling and KPI systems, cost optimization and professional supplier management.
services: Development of category strategies and commodity group management
Optimization of procurement organization and processes
Cost structure analysis and identification of savings potential

supplyChain.title: Supply Chain Management
supplyChain.description: End-to-end optimization of the supply chain, inventory reduction, process improvement and implementation of supply chain visibility and risk management.
services: Inventory optimization and working capital reduction
Implementation of S2P and P2P processes
Supply chain visibility and risk management

operations.title: Operations
operations.description: Increasing operational efficiency, implementation of lean management, continuous improvement and process optimization.

sourcing.title: Sourcing
sourcing.description: Strategic sourcing, professional tender management, contract negotiations and establishment of global sourcing networks.

interim.title: Interim Executive
interim.description: Temporary leadership responsibility in key procurement and supply chain positions, bridging vacancies and support during transformation phases.
services: Temporary leadership responsibility in key positions
Bridging vacancies in procurement and supply chain

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.subtitle: Reference Projects and Results
successStories.description: Discover how I've helped companies achieve measurable results.

story1.title: 15% Cost Reduction Through Strategic Procurement Optimization
story1.description: Comprehensive realignment of procurement for a medium-sized industrial company, leading to significant savings.

story2.title: Supply Chain Transformation in the Automotive Industry
story2.description: Implementation of a digital supply chain solution that improved supply chain resilience and reduced supply bottlenecks by 40%.

story3.title: Operational Excellence in Production
story3.description: By introducing lean management principles, production efficiency was increased by 25% and throughput times were halved.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Despite careful content control, we assume no liability for the content of external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Data Protection Declaration
privacy.intro: The protection of your personal data is important to us. In this privacy policy, we inform you about the collection, processing, and use of your data.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We automatically collect and store information in log files that your browser transmits to us. This includes: browser type/version, operating system used, referrer URL, hostname of the accessing computer, time of server request.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer and saved by your browser. They serve to make our offer more user-friendly, effective, and secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to free information about your stored personal data, its origin and recipients, and the purpose of data processing, as well as a right to correction, blocking, or deletion of this data.
